title: For Sale:  BEWARE OF: For Sale: Norinco -- SKS 138 7.62x39 with Extras Listed In Hudson Valley
location: Hudson valley, Hudson Valley, New York
postcontent:
BEWARE OF: For Sale: Norinco -- SKS 138 7.62x39 with Extras 
Listed in Hudson valley. This "seller" will immediately text you to telle you that he is awaiting your address for FFL to send you the rifle. If you attempt to obtain a phone number where you can actually speak to him, he will text you that he is DEAF and can only communicate by text. If you attempt to pick it up locally, he will offer the explanation that he is currently in Brooklyn and that he has had bad experiences meeting people in the past. If you are looking to lose $250, this is the guy to deal with. 
Used, excellent condition Norinco SKS chambered for 7.62x39. This gun was made in Arsenal 0138 and bears the [0138] marking on the left side of the receiver. This is a milled steel receiver gun with threaded barrel and short barrel lug. Serial number 76011xxC. Imported by Poly Tech Parts out of Atlanta. Best guess is manufacture in the early 1980's but I know of no way to very accurately date any SKS other than Arsenal /26\ guns.

The M1917 Revolver (formally United States Revolver, Caliber .45, M1917) was a U.S. six-shotrevolver of .45 ACP caliber. It was adopted by theU.S. Army in 1917 to supplement the standardM1911 .45 ACP semi-automatic pistol during World War I. Afterwards, it was primarily used by secondary and non-deployed troops. There were two variations of the M1917, one from Colt and one from S&W.

title: For Sale:  Beeman RS2 Air Rifle
postcontent:
This is a very nice, adult, air rifle.  This is not a cheap toy BB gun that you used as a kid.  This Beeman RS2 comes with 2 barrels, a .177 and a .22 barrel.  The .177 barrel will put out about 1200 FPS with the right pellet, and the .22 will do 700-800 FPS.  I have put around 700 pelelts through the .22 barrel, and only 50 or so through the .177.  I have shot numerous small game with the .22, including: Skunks, Possums, Crows, Rabbits, Starlings, Pigeons etc.  This is a spring powered air rifle, and requires a special "artillery hold" for best accuracy, check youtube for details.  I can make consistent hits on my 4" plate at 75 yards, and I'm not the best airgun shooter by far.

I'm including about 100 Gamo .22 pellets, and about 300 crossman .177 pellets.

The pictured scope is a TASCO 3-7x20, that will be included.

title: For Sale:  Beretta PX4 9MM with Trijicon Night Sights
location: Clemmons - Mocksville, Winston Salem, North Carolina
postcontent:
Beretta PX4 Storm - Lightly used - Original cardboard outer box (with retail price), plastic case, warranty card, owner's manual, backstraps, parts cup, 2 - 17 round magazines - has high quality trijicon night sights - very accurate and fun to shoot - Retail was $600 + $135 Trijicon Night Sights. 
Excellent deal for $550
Berreta Info: 

The new Beretta Px4 Storm pistol is the most advanced expression of technological and aesthetic features in a semiautomatic sidearm. Built around a modular concept that a pistol can be adapted to different needs and modes of operations, without compromising on ergonomics and the renowned Beretta reliability and performance, the Px4 Storm emphasizes power, ease of handling, performance and reliability.
Manufactured in three calibers, the Px4 Storm uses an exclusive Beretta designed innovative locked-breech with a rotating barrel system, the strongest action to date. 
The light yet durable frame employs modern thermoplastic technology through the use of technopolymer reinforced fiberglass. Modular structure, ergonomics and interchangeability of parts make the Px4 Storm the ideal firearm for law-enforcement use, as well as personal defense.
1. Accessory Rail: The frame of the Px4 Storm has an integral Picatinny MILSTD-1913 rail for rapid attachment of tactical lights and laser aiming devices.
2. Slide: The sides of the slide are smooth and offer snag-proof insertion and removal of the pistol from its holster. The front and rear serrations on the slide facilitate slide operation and safety control in both wet or dry conditions.

Other PX4 Accessories 3. Visible Automatic Firing Pin Block: The front part of the firing pin is blocked from any forward movement until the trigger is pulled completely back. The block is
located rearward, far away from the fouling and debris of the breech face. Since the block is visible, the user may ascertain its proper operation at any time. Even if the pistol falls and strikes the ground muzzle down, the firing pin will not strike the primer.
4. 3-Dot Sight System: Features a white ‘3-dot’ sight pattern for quick acquisition of the target. The rear sight is designed to provide a front projection so that, in
an emergency, the user may retract the slide single-handedly by pushing the rear sight against the edge of a table, door, etc.
5. Ambidextrous Safety (Type F): The ambidextrous safety lever, easily accessible by the thumb or a right or left handed shooter, is spring loaded so it’s either positively “on” or “off”. The safety lever also functions as the pistol’s decocking lever. When pushed down, the rear part of the firing pin (striker) is rotated out of alignment with the front part of the firing pin. (NOTE: Type C does not have an external safety/decocking lever). Additional hammer drop catch (half cock notch) prevents striking of the firing pin unit in the remote chance of unintentional hammer drop.
6. External Hammer Design: A traditional feature of Beretta pistols, this design provides the most energy to the firing pin, virtually eliminating the possibility of
misfires due to light primer strikes. Also provides an immediate visual and tactile indicator as to the cocked/uncocked status of the pistol.
7. Individual Size Grips: Pistol may be configured with small, medium or large backstraps to individually fit the hand of each shooter. The backstraps are checkered to ensure a firm grip in both wet or dry shooting conditions. Three backstraps included with every pistol.
8. Reversible Magazine Release: Multiple-sized, reversible magazine release buttons allow for customization to the individual’s hand size. Small size comes standard on the gun, while medium and large buttons are available as accessories and easy replacement. Each size may be positioned for right-handed or left-handed use. 

9. Simple Field Stripping: Pistol is designed for extremely quick and simple field stripping. Disassembly latch does not remove from the gun, preventing accidental
dropping and loss. Reassembly is easy and accidental misassembly of parts is prevented by the distinctive design.
10. Light Technopolymer Frame: The light, yet durable, frame employs modern thermoplastic technology through the use of Corrosion resistant fiberglass reinforced polymer.
11. Barrrel: The Px4’s unique rotating barrel and locking system dissipates recoil energy radially, reducing felt recoil and muzzle rise. This is the strongest Beretta pistol action. Chrome lined barrels provide extreme corrosion resistance, as well as ease of cleaning. Barrels also feature a deeply recessed combat muzzle crown to protect the rifling. (NOTE: Sub-Compact models feature tilt-barrel locking system and stainless steel construction). 

Visit the new PX4 Web Site WWW.PX4STORM.COM

postcontent:
HK P30 below MSRP

HK P30 $949
M730903-A5



A recent HK pistol design, the P30 is a modern police and security pistol that combines function and safety. Ergonomic features include a special grip frame with interchangeable backstrap inserts and lateral plates, allowing the pistol to be individually adapted to any user. Ambidextrous controls include dual slide releases and magazine release levers.

Variants with a conventional double-action/single action trigger have a serrated decocking button located on the rear of the frame. Variants with HK’s enhanced double action only Law Enforcement Modification* (LEM) trigger have no external decocking controls.

The HK Law Enforcement Modification (LEM) trigger system combines the advantages of a cocked striker component (constant level of trigger pull from first to last round fired) with a double-action hammer system. Using such an enhanced trigger system consolidates ease of use and safety into a convenient, innovative trigger operation—one that reduces the chance of unintended firing. And in case of an ammunition-related failure to fire, all that is needed is an additional second or third squeeze of the trigger without the need of first pulling the slide back to re-cock the pistol. The enhanced LEM trigger system combines the reliability of a double action revolver trigger with the crisp trigger of a single action pistol.

P30S models have an ambidextrous safety lever mounted on both sides of the frame. S models are available in conventional double-action/single action trigger mode and with HK’s enhanced double action only Law Enforcement Modification trigger

A Picatinny rail molded into the front of the frame makes mounting lights, laser aimers, or other accessories easy and convenient. The extractor doubles as a loaded chamber indicator providing a subtle tactile and visual reminder of a loaded chamber.

Extensively tested, the P30 has already been adopted by several European police agencies. Excellent weight and balance make the P30 naturally pointable, easy to control, and accurate to shoot. An open notch rear sight with luminous (non-radioactive) contrast points allows for fast and accurate target acquisition, even under poor lighting conditions.

During a recent (2009-2010) endurance test, a P30 test pistol fired more than 91,000 rounds without any major component failures.

P30 and P30S models available in 9 mm and .40 S&W.

title: For Sale:  Beretta PX4 9MM - Trijicon night sights
location: Clemmons - Mocksville, Winston Salem, North Carolina
postcontent:
Beretta PX4 Storm - Lightly used - Original cardboard outer box (with retail price), plastic case, warranty card, owner's manual, backstraps, parts cup, 2 - 17 round magazines -  magazine loader - has high quality trijicon night sights - very accurate and fun to shoot - Retail was $600 + $135 Trijicon Night Sights. 
Excellent deal for $550  CCH Permit or Pistol Permit Required to sigh bill of sale - Thanks
Berreta Info: 

The new Beretta Px4 Storm pistol is the most advanced expression of technological and aesthetic features in a semiautomatic sidearm. Built around a modular concept that a pistol can be adapted to different needs and modes of operations, without compromising on ergonomics and the renowned Beretta reliability and performance, the Px4 Storm emphasizes power, ease of handling, performance and reliability.
Manufactured in three calibers, the Px4 Storm uses an exclusive Beretta designed innovative locked-breech with a rotating barrel system, the strongest action to date. 
The light yet durable frame employs modern thermoplastic technology through the use of technopolymer reinforced fiberglass. Modular structure, ergonomics and interchangeability of parts make the Px4 Storm the ideal firearm for law-enforcement use, as well as personal defense.
1. Accessory Rail: The frame of the Px4 Storm has an integral Picatinny MILSTD-1913 rail for rapid attachment of tactical lights and laser aiming devices.
2. Slide: The sides of the slide are smooth and offer snag-proof insertion and removal of the pistol from its holster. The front and rear serrations on the slide facilitate slide operation and safety control in both wet or dry conditions.

Other PX4 Accessories 3. Visible Automatic Firing Pin Block: The front part of the firing pin is blocked from any forward movement until the trigger is pulled completely back. The block is
located rearward, far away from the fouling and debris of the breech face. Since the block is visible, the user may ascertain its proper operation at any time. Even if the pistol falls and strikes the ground muzzle down, the firing pin will not strike the primer.
4. 3-Dot Sight System: Features a white ‘3-dot’ sight pattern for quick acquisition of the target. The rear sight is designed to provide a front projection so that, in
an emergency, the user may retract the slide single-handedly by pushing the rear sight against the edge of a table, door, etc.
5. Ambidextrous Safety (Type F): The ambidextrous safety lever, easily accessible by the thumb or a right or left handed shooter, is spring loaded so it’s either positively “on” or “off”. The safety lever also functions as the pistol’s decocking lever. When pushed down, the rear part of the firing pin (striker) is rotated out of alignment with the front part of the firing pin. (NOTE: Type C does not have an external safety/decocking lever). Additional hammer drop catch (half cock notch) prevents striking of the firing pin unit in the remote chance of unintentional hammer drop.
6. External Hammer Design: A traditional feature of Beretta pistols, this design provides the most energy to the firing pin, virtually eliminating the possibility of
misfires due to light primer strikes. Also provides an immediate visual and tactile indicator as to the cocked/uncocked status of the pistol.
7. Individual Size Grips: Pistol may be configured with small, medium or large backstraps to individually fit the hand of each shooter. The backstraps are checkered to ensure a firm grip in both wet or dry shooting conditions. Three backstraps included with every pistol.
8. Reversible Magazine Release: Multiple-sized, reversible magazine release buttons allow for customization to the individual’s hand size. Small size comes standard on the gun, while medium and large buttons are available as accessories and easy replacement. Each size may be positioned for right-handed or left-handed use. 

9. Simple Field Stripping: Pistol is designed for extremely quick and simple field stripping. Disassembly latch does not remove from the gun, preventing accidental
dropping and loss. Reassembly is easy and accidental misassembly of parts is prevented by the distinctive design.
10. Light Technopolymer Frame: The light, yet durable, frame employs modern thermoplastic technology through the use of Corrosion resistant fiberglass reinforced polymer.
11. Barrrel: The Px4’s unique rotating barrel and locking system dissipates recoil energy radially, reducing felt recoil and muzzle rise. This is the strongest Beretta pistol action. Chrome lined barrels provide extreme corrosion resistance, as well as ease of cleaning. Barrels also feature a deeply recessed combat muzzle crown to protect the rifling. 

Visit the new PX4 Web Site WWW.PX4STORM.COM

The new Chiappa Rhino barrel is aligned with the bottom most chamber which is the key component to Rhino's tame characteristics. The position of the barrel lowers the center of gravity and yields a centerline of the bore more in line with the shooter's arm allowing for the most natural "point ability" while engaging a target. The reduction of the recoil allows for the use of ultra light alloys to be used in the construction of the Rhino minimizing any adverse effect. title: For Sale/Trade:  Taurus Judge public defender .410/.45LC one owner firearm super clean
postcontent: this is a Taurus Judge poly public defender and is my ccw, I have only taken it to the range twice since purchasing new comes with original box and papers very clean firearm and a blast to shoot the 410 range is 75yrd to 100yrds the 45LC are shot on accurate with 3" groupings every gun collector/enthusiast should own one. the recoil is very controlled with a 3" to 4" pull up and very quick to place back on target. My wife loves the gun and handles it very well so ladies and gents this is a great all around gun for target, ccw or home defense its a very intimidating pistol and backs it up!

title: For Sale:  Regent R350CR
postcontent:
R350 CR
The Regent R350CR is a compact variant of the 1911 with a four-inch barrel. It is equipped with a rail, beavertail grip safety, ambidextrous extended thumb safety, commander-style hammer and skeleton trigger. Shipped with a 7-round magazine and Hogue® grips already installed, the Regent R350CR retails in the neighborhood of a reasonable $600.

Quality is not left to chance—the slide of the Regent is manufactured from CNC machined bar stock with a low-cut ejection port, the frame is steel investment cast, and the barrel is hammer forged stainless steel—all manufactured to ISO 9001 and NATO AQAP 120 quality standards.

Accessorizing the R350CR handgun can be as simple as adding almost any aftermarket part made for M1911-style pistols, giving you the ability to customize your sidearm to fit your style.

Caliber: .45 ACP
Capacity: 7 rds
Mode of Fire; Semi-Auto
Barrel Length: 4 in.
Rifling Grooves: 6
Rifling Twist: 1:16" RH
Front Sight: Serrated Ramp
Front Sight Width: .075 in.
Rear Sight: Combat Style
Overall Length: 7 5/8 in.
Overall Height w/ mag: 5 3/8 in.
Overall Width; 1 5/16 in.
Trigger Action: Single
Safety Type: Manual, Grip

Brand new and unfired SCAR 16S black rifle in original FN box and factory shipping box, including all original accessories and extra FNH Mag. Box was opened only to take pictures. The SCAR is the semi-auto only version of the newest service rifle of U.S. special operators. Light, fast-handling and quick shooting, the SCAR® 16S is chambered in 5.56x45mm NATO (223 Rem.) and features a free-floating, cold hammer-forged MIL-SPEC barrel with chrome-lined bore. Fully-ambidextrous operating controls on both models instantly adapt to any shooter and any shooting position. The receiver-integrated MIL-STD 1913 optical rail and three accessory rails enable the mounting of scopes or electronic sights, plus tactical lights and lasers. The telescoping, side-folding polymer stock is fully adjustable for comb height and length-of-pull.

Great stuff for MINI 30s too as Ruger recommends using only brass cased rounds. Local sale only.

title: For Sale:  Beautiful Tiger Stripe smooth bore
postcontent:
Beautiful tiger striped smooth bore flintlock. Top quality flintlock was bought for a museum display that never happened. Has been in storage for over a year and never shot.
This is not a kit gun or some thing turned on an assembly line, it is all custom.
According to the original paper work the gun was created by D. Prudden (stamped in the barrel) . The gun has a Jim Cambers lock and a octagonal to round, Getz Barrel.  This gun is a representation of the early 1700's long hunter or militia gun. As as smooth bore it will give you lots of success hunting large game as well as fowl. I will consider a partial trade for a M1 garand or carbine or possible a colt pistol. I will be glad to ship and it should cost no more than $50.00 s/h/i to get it to you in the USA. Feel free to call for more infor at REDACTED. Peter

title: For Sale:  Tactical Survival Training
postcontent:
The Fuze Team presents Tactical Survival Training on the beautiful Northern Neck of Virginia. Elements of the training encompass individual skills, as well as synergistic skill sets that add benefits to any individual or group. Some of our training expertise includes: Small Unit Tactics, Land Navigation, Tracking, Hunting/Trapping, and Small Unit Leadership.

Your trainers are subject matter experts from the Special Operations community with 
experience as Green Berets, Rangers, SEALs, Force Reconnaissance Marines, and ParaRescue. 

Our experience is global; comprising of every hostile and austere condition imaginable. We provide our expertise - so that you can fulfill your survival and teambuilding needs.

At our facility we offer training for the most hardcore Prepper groups, or individuals, to 
increase readiness for what may come. We also have the ability to provide customized survival scenarios for groups looking to have a good time, while learning skills that match their survival plan. 

For a limited time only we are offering warm weather discounted rates for an intense 24 hour group assessment and training class. We are beginning to fill our summer classes now.

General Agenda: 

Block I (est. 12 Hours): Arrival, briefing, and Scenario Based Activity (GASP)

Block II (est. 8 Hours): Training, After Action Review, and Final Out


Purpose: The GASP will introduce clients to a "real-world" situation and help expose both 
strengths and weaknesses of the group as a whole. This training iteration will be an intense introduction into the skills needed for survival in a chaotic environment. This is meant to stress, test, and upset the balance of any group to expose both strengths and weaknesses in an austere environment. By taking you out of your comfort zone and exposing you to being tired, hungry, and disoriented, your group will need to adapt and overcome your situation and environment to thrive.

The GASP Basic (GASP-B) course is a pre-requisite for follow on training, and will provide our team the opportunity to assess group and individual strengths and weaknesses. This is not a firearms training course. Airsoft type firearms will be provided for familiarization purposes only. 

Rates:
$125.00 per person for groups of 4 or less
$110.00 per person for groups of 5-10
We are willing to provide services for barter, please contact us for details.

title: Want To Buy:  Saiga 7.62x39 wanted
postcontent:
I am seeking to purchase factory stock Saiga 7.62×39 rifle. Preferably new, or like new. (I own other Saiga rifles, and sometimes they don't work correctly. I would preferred that at least one round have been fired to make sure the rifle cycles properly).

I live in New York, so it cannot be modified or converted at all.

Ideally it should come with the factory 10 round magazine. In New York we are not allowed magazines larger than 10 rounds so I do not need any other magazine, (cannot even accept it).

I am not desperate, am patient, willing to wait for the right deal, will not overpay, and definitely not paying any crazy price. I will go with the lowest offered. If you want to move your rifle, and a willing to let go for a very good buy, then I am potentially your buyer.

Reasonably, and rationally, sending money to a stranger through this site is perilous to say the least. I prefer if at all possible that the transaction occur through an FFL dealer so that I know for sure that I'm sending money in a rifle is actually coming. If an FFL dealer is not available, I prefer that somehow we make arrangements so that I know for sure my monies are not being pilfered.

I have a FFL dealer on my end ready to go.

If you have ammunition, that would be helpful, but not mandatory.

Thank you

Compatible with many different brands of 1911 magazine, the FX series is certain to have the 1911 pistol enthusiast set for hours of satisfactory shooting
